distroi.model.param module

Module defining the implementation of a model component parameter.

class distroi.model.param.Param(name=None, value=0, range=(- inf, inf), tuneable=False)

Bases: object

Defines a model component parameter.

Variables

  • value (float) – The value of the parameter.

  • range (tuple[float, float]) – Range to which a parameter should be restricted during fitting routines. Can be +-np.inf to indicate the lack of a bound.

  • tuneable (bool) – Whether or not the parameter is tuneable by a fitting routine.
